<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">[Acid Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=564)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=3" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Moloch](/Deities.aspx?ID=70), [Trelmarixian](/Deities.aspx?ID=137)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot-radius burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You evoke a storm of acid rain that pelts the area for the spell’s duration. A creature that begins its turn in the area takes 3d8 acid damage (basic Reflex save).

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d8.
name: Acid Storm
